name: I Can't Live Without Cigarettes
lyric:
good moring cigarettes
good evening cigarettes
i can't stop ,i can't stop to live
i love nicotine,it's in my soul
burns my life ,lights my dream
wakes my dying heart,makes me real
you never let me down,i belong to you
i need your little kisses now

i can't live without cigarettes
i can't live without cigarettes
i can't live without cigarettes
i can't,i can't

i live for you cigarettes
i'll die for you cigarettes
i can't stop,i can't stop to exist
i love nicotine,i'll always need
i have to lie ,i have to hide
i have to lose in this winner's world
but there's something i really want
i need your little kisses now

i can't live without cigarettes
i can't live without cigarettes
i can't live without cigarettes
i can't,i can't

i never understand,i am never satisfied
why does all the shit fall on me
the world is cheating and i am a liar
i need your kisses ,i can't escape

i can't live without cigarettes
i can't live without cigarettes
i can't live without cigarettes
i can't,i can't
lyric_extra:
文本歌词最后由 Dirty Shirt 编辑于2019-09-11 15:11

LRC歌词最后由 doctor 编辑于2019-09-11 14:33

comments.brief:
goodmornong cigarette
evening cigarette
再给我一夜 让我空着肚子来啊来啊来好多酒
我是个笨蛋
我只想听这些
你离开了 768，从此没人陪我抽烟
